chapters.title: Chapter 29: Homecoming
chapters.info: Natti Cauthon, p. 477 (428)—Abell's wife, Mat's mother. She and two of her daughters were arrested by the Whitecloaks as Darkfriends because of Fain's suggestions that Mat is a Darkfriend. See also Cauthon, Abell; Cauthon, Bodewhin; Cauthon, Eldrin; Cauthon, Matrim.
